reviewText: Another great Susan Harris workout. Been working out with her for decades

I am an advanced excerciser and was afraid this would be too easy for me but I was in for a nice surprise! I love Susan Harris and have yet to be disappointed in any of the workouts that I've tried by her. I did work up a sweat during this and now that I'm 48 and have had several injuries it's nice to have more Mat workouts in my collection as a change from hard core workouts. I also love Firm Volume 1 with Susan as well as Volume 4 and FitNess Favorites Original Time Crunch
I've ordered this twice now and don't know why they don't pull it, because it must have been discontinued

Not picking on Tamela Hastie, though I do prefer this original to the remake. Susan Harris is such a mature, soothing instructor. I also prefer the added hand weight movements that are missing from the newer version. I feel more thoroughly worked out. Great 45 min. workout which will leave you relaxed and tired in a good way.
Susan Harris is an awesome instructor. I love this workout and was glad I could find it in DVD format!! Light airy background---kinda like old style firm workouts. AWESOME!!!
